welcome.confirmed_booking: Your booking is confirmed for these dates. Please have a look through the guidebook, where you'll find key information and our AI assistant. During your stay, this page will also let you see and control your room's heating and lighting.
welcome.during_stay: Welcome to our guidebook, where you can find information, chat with our AI assistant, and see and control your room's heating and lighting.

ha_dashboard.light_unavailable: Power is off at the wall switch.

chat.initial_message: Welcome! I'm Victoria, your AI assistant. Ask me anything about the guesthouse or your London trip.
chat.session_load_error: Could not load chat session. Please return to the guidebook and try again.

error_page.missing_code_message: Your link is missing a booking code. Please use the exact link provided to you.
error_page.contact_message: Please ensure you are using the correct, most recent link. If you continue to have trouble, please contact us through your booking platform.

content_html.wholeHomeBedroomsDetailed:
The house has the following bedrooms:

  • Ground Floor: Rooms 1 & 2.
  • First Floor: Room 3.
  • Second Floor: Rooms 4 & 5.
  • Third Floor (Loft): Room 6.
  • Basement: A bonus room (Room 0) with a single bed is attached to the kitchen.
content_html.storageUnderBed: You can create more space by storing luggage under the bed, as shown in this video:
content_html.storageInBed: This bed frame has a lift-up mattress with significant storage space inside, as shown in this video:
content_html.wholeHomeBathrooms:
There are three bathrooms available for your use:

  • Bathroom A: Located on the ground floor.
  • Bathroom B: Located on the second floor.
  • Bathroom C: This is an en-suite bathroom located inside Room 3 on the first floor.
content_html.bathroomC: Your private bathroom is the en-suite inside your room.
content_html.bathroomShared:
This is a shared bathroom. Please be considerate of other guests:

  • Use Your Assigned Compartment: Store your toiletries in your numbered space.
  • Keep it Tidy: Please leave the bathroom clean for the next person.
  • Be Mindful of Time: Limit use to ~15 minutes, especially during peak morning hours.
content_html.bathroomPrivate: This bathroom is private for your exclusive use.
content_html.kitchenShared:
The shared kitchen is located in the basement, through the door marked 'K'. Please:

  • Use Assigned Storage: Each room has a numbered space in the fridge and cabinets.
  • Clean As You Go: Place used dishes in the dishwasher. Staff will run it when full.
content_html.kitchenPrivate: The kitchen is private for your group's exclusive use.
content_html.kitchenBase:
Shared Supplies: Help yourself to complimentary tea and coffee, as well as basic condiments and spices.

Rubbish: The large metal bin is for recycling. General waste goes in the black bin.

Here are video guides for the appliances:

  • Induction Stove:
  • Microwave:
content_html.windowsStandard: The window can be opened by pressing the button on the handle and turning it upwards.
content_html.windowsTiltTurn: These are "tilt and turn" windows. This video demonstrates how to open them for ventilation (tilt) or fully (turn):
content_html.noLaundry:
There are no guest-accessible washing machines on-site. A highly-rated local launderette is True Colours Launderette.

Towels are not changed daily. For fresh towels (max. once every 2 days), please leave used ones outside your door by 11:00am.
content_html.hasLaundry: The washing machine is available for your use. It is located in the basement. This video provides access and usage instructions:
content_html.wholeHomeLuggage:
Self Check-in: From 15:00 onwards.

Luggage Storage: If you require luggage storage outside of check-in/out times, please message us. Depending on availability, you may be able to store bags in the front room (Room 1).
content_html.checkoutStatic:
Check-out is at 11:00 AM.

You don't need to worry about any cleaning; our team will handle everything.

‚ö†Ô∏è A quick but important request: Please be sure to take all your belongings from the room by 11am. Our cleaning team works on a tight schedule and will clear the room completely for our next guests.
content_html.checkinStaticDetailed:
Self Check-in: From 15:00 onwards on your day of arrival.

Early Luggage Drop-off: From 11:00, you can use a front door code to access Cupboard V downstairs.

Early Check-in: We don't receive live updates on when individual rooms are ready, but you are welcome to check for yourself from midday onwards, or to ask a cleaner if you see them on-site. ‚ö†Ô∏è Please do not leave your belongings in the room unless it is completely finished. Our team operates on a tight schedule and may mistake your items for a previous guest's, which could result in them being disposed of. An occupied room also prevents our team from cleaning to our high standards. If your room is not yet ready, please use the secure luggage storage (Cupboard V) downstairs.

This video shows the full process:
content_html.checkoutStaticDetailed:
Check-out is at 11:00 AM.

You don't need to worry about any cleaning; our team will handle everything.

If you need to store your luggage üß≥ after you check out, you are welcome to use Cupboard V downstairs. An entry code will work for the front door and the cupboard until 14:00. If you need to arrange a later pick-up, please send us a message to check for availability.

‚ö†Ô∏è A quick but important request: Please be sure to take all your belongings from the room by 11am. Our cleaning team works on a tight schedule and will clear the room completely for our next guests.
content_html.heatingBase:
You can control the temperature in your room using the valve (TRV) on your radiator.

Cooling: We do not have air conditioning. We recommend keeping the window and curtains closed during sunny days and opening them in the evening.
content_html.heatingSmartAddon: For bookings with smart home controls, you can also adjust this from the dashboard on this page.
content_html.lightsNote: Please note that these smart lights can only be controlled from this app when the physical light switch on the wall is in the 'ON' position. If a light is unresponsive, please check that its corresponding wall switch is turned on first.
content_html.wholeHomeRubbish: Rubbish bags can be left on the pavement outside the front door, in front of the black fencing. The council collects it daily from this location.
